remarks: A strong recursive sequence is a function over the nonnegative integers.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Apr-2019.)
statement:
sseqval.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. _V ) $.
sseqval.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. Word S ) $.
sseqval.3 $e |- W = ( Word S i^i ( `' # " ( ZZ>= ` ( # ` M ) ) ) ) $.
sseqval.4 $e |- ( ph -> F : W --> S ) $.
sseqfn $p |- ( ph -> ( M seqstr F ) Fn NN0 ) $.
